articles.author: Miles Kruppa
articles.title: Google’s Revenue Growth Slows, Sending Shares Down - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Tech giant will boost spending on data centers and other capital expenditures to $75 billion this year

articles.author: Paresh Dave, Caroline Haskins
articles.title: Google Lifts a Ban on Using Its AI for Weapons and Surveillance - WIRED
articles.description: Google published principles in 2018 barring its AI technology from being used for sensitive purposes. Weeks into President Donald Trump’s second term, those guidelines are being overhauled.
articles.content: Google announced Tuesday that it is overhauling the principles governing how it uses artificial intelligence and other advanced technology. The company removed language promising not to pursue techno… [+3764 chars]
